args: const { McpServerWrapper } = require('./out/infrastructure/mcp/McpServerWrapper.js'); const { DiagnosticsWatcher } = require('./out/core/diagnostics/DiagnosticsWatcher.js'); const { VsCodeApiAdapter } = require('./out/infrastructure/vscode/VsCodeApiAdapter.js'); const mockVscode = { languages: { onDidChangeDiagnostics: () => ({ dispose: () => {} }), getDiagnostics: () => [] }, workspace: { getWorkspaceFolder: () => null } }; const adapter = new VsCodeApiAdapter(mockVscode); const watcher = new DiagnosticsWatcher(adapter); const server = new McpServerWrapper(watcher, { enableDebugLogging: true }); server.start().catch(console.error);
